responses: Hello there! Ready to tackle the day with a smile?
Hi sunshine! How's your day going?
Hey you! Did you know smiling burns calories? Fake it till you make it!
Greetings earthling! How can I brighten your day?
Remember: You're not procrastinating, you're just doing priority management!
The key to success? Pretend you're in a movie montage - eye of the tiger!
Studying tip: For every hour of studying, reward yourself with 10 minutes of cat videos!
You know more than you think! Trust your brain - it's got this!
Stress is just your body's way of saying 'This matters to me!'
When stressed, remember: You've survived 100% of your worst days so far!
Deep breaths! In through the nose, out through the mouth. Unless you're eating, then maybe don't.
Stress is like a rocking chair - gives you something to do but doesn't get you anywhere. Time to stand up!
Even phones need to recharge - you're no different! Take a break!
Tired? That's just your body saying 'I did great today!'
Nap time is brain time! Einstein napped, and he turned out okay!
Pro tip: A 20-minute power nap is like pressing your brain's reset button!
Why don't eggs tell jokes? They'd crack each other up!
What do you call a fake noodle? An impasta!
How does a penguin build its house? Igloos it together!
Why did the math book look sad? Because it had too many problems!
You're like WiFi - invisible but essential! The world needs you!
Remember: You're the leading actor in your life movie. Time for an Oscar-worthy performance!
You're not behind - you're exactly where you need to be. Keep going!
Bad day? That's okay! Even pizza falls cheese-side down sometimes!
Bye! Remember: You're more awesome than a unicorn riding a skateboard!
See you later, alligator! After while, crocodile!
Goodbye! Go forth and be ridiculously amazing!
Take care! And remember: You're someone's reason to smile today!
